Posts.Content: Dear Pam, Thanks for sharing the good news! We don't know how long we will live regardless of breast cancer and so the theme is constant that we must live each day and treasure the life we have chosen. I hope and pray for the right "chemo cocktail" for you and for a cure for breast cancer. Thank you for all your postings...you are a wise and thoughtful woman. Love to you, Luckyj
Posts.Title: Halway results
